section.title: &kw-hos-tm; &kw-hos-version-50;: Mid-scale KVM with VSA Model
section.para: The mid-scale model illustrates two important aspects of configuring &kw-hos; for increased scale. The controller services are distributed across a greater number of controllers and a number of the networks are configured as multiple L3 segments (implementing per-rack networking).

para.link: Download Editable Visio Network Diagram Template

section.para: The distribution of services across controllers is only one possible configuration, and other combinations can also be expressed.
